analysis.description:

	- totalTokensICO2 (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#589-590)
	- totalTokensICO3 (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#599-600)

Reentrancy in ElepigCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#663-668):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.mint(community,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol)
airdropped in ElepigCrowdsale.airdropTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#638) is a local variable never initialiazed

ElepigCrowdsale.donate (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#533-611) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.mint(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#576)

ElepigCrowdsale.finish (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#663-668) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.mint(community,unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol)

ElepigCrowdsale.airdropTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(tokenReward.transferFrom(_from,_recipient[i],tokens)) (/unique_chucks/25/0xe6be085afbe3119907725e901679f0b9a5ebc6da.sol#648-653)
